channel.title: [Delta/Blankscape] Can't get a shop to appear
channel.description:
I have been following some Delta tutorials but can't get any shops to appear, I have just started getting back into RSPS development so please don't tell me to use another source, I know it has it's flaws :).
Here is my Autospawn.cfg: [code] 549 3091 3506 0 0 0 0 0 1 [ENDOFSPAWNLIST] [/code]
Here is my shops.cfg: [code] //-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount 1 Horviks Pures 2 2 4068 100 [ENDOFSHOPLIST] [/code]
And here is the snippet from client.java: [code] } else if (NPCID == 549) { //Horvik PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 10; //Varrock Armor shop [/code]
So what could be the issue? I'm rtying to spawn it in edgeville, but won't appear.

item.title: [Delta/Blankscape] Can't get a shop to appear
item.dc:creator: @abtekk abtekk
item.description:
@abtekk wrote:

God dammit, still nothing…

Your Server Is Now Up.....
Good Luck :) :Wild
 Is now online!

49     3091    3506    0       0       0       0       0       2"
        at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
        at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1814)
        at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23)
        at server.main(server.java:28)

item.title: [Delta/Blankscape] Can't get a shop to appear
item.dc:creator: @abtekk abtekk
item.description:
@abtekk wrote:

I have been following some Delta tutorials but can’t get any shops to appear, I have just started getting back into RSPS development so please don’t tell me to use another source, I know it has it’s flaws :).

Here is my Autospawn.cfg:

549        3091        3506        0        0        0        0        0        1
[ENDOFSPAWNLIST]

Here is my shops.cfg:

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount
1       Horviks Pures                                   2        2      4068     100
[ENDOFSHOPLIST]

And here is the snippet from client.java:

} else if (NPCID == 549) { //Horvik
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 10; //Varrock Armor shop

So what could be the issue? I’m rtying to spawn it in edgeville, but won’t appear.

Read full topic
